shrimp.name: Ring
shrimp.description: Returns 1 if in the Ring, otherwise 0
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: x,y give the point to be tested

input.name: y
input.description: x,y give the point to be tested

input.name: ox
input.description: ox,oy give the centre of the ring

input.name: oy
input.description: ox,oy give the centre of the ring

input.name: blur
input.description: The amount the edge is to be blurred

output.name: out
output.description: returns 1 if x,y lies within the ring

shrimp.usage: Tests whether a 2d point lies inside a 2d Torus shape. Blur can be used to control the antialiasing. The output varies smoothly between 0 and 1 in the blurred region.
